statements: UPDATE historical_texts SET text_content='New content for text 1' WHERE text_id=1;

UPDATE historical_texts SET author='Jane Austen', publication_year=1811 WHERE text_id=1;

UPDATE Manuscripts SET condition = 'Excellent', location = 'Library' WHERE manuscript_id = '3b924d70-f866-4747-9ad9-3173ac717bdd';

UPDATE historical_texts SET publication_year = 1900 WHERE text_id = 1;
UPDATE manuscripts SET author_name = 'Jane Doe', manuscript_type = 'Poem' WHERE manuscript_id = 3;
UPDATE historical_texts SET text_title = 'The New World', author_name = 'John Smith' WHERE text_id = 1;
UPDATE manuscripts SET manuscript_type = 'Handwritten', year_written = 1700 WHERE manuscript_id = 3;
UPDATE texts SET title = 'New Title', author = 'Jane Doe' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE Authors SET nationality = 'French' WHERE author_id = 3;
UPDATE Texts SET text_title = 'New Title', author = 'New Author', year_published = 2022 WHERE text_id = 1;
UPDATE Authors SET birth_year = 1990, nationality = 'American' WHERE author_id = 2;
